summary: After a wealthy man finds out his wife is a gold digger, he meets and falls for a widowed mother, and complications ensue.
cast: Carole Lombard|Cary Grant|Kay Francis|Charles Coburn|Helen Vinson|Katharine Alexander|Jonathan Hale|Nella Walker|Alan Baxter|Maurice Moscovitch|Peggy Ann Garner|Spencer Charters|James Adamson|Arthur Aylesworth|Jack Chapin|Charles Coleman|John Dilson|Fern Emmett|Edward Fliegle|Byron Foulger|Gus Glassmire|Douglas Gordon|Jesse Graves|Sam Harris|Harold Hoff|Lloyd Ingraham|John Laing|Mary MacLaren|Harriet Matthews|Tony Merlo|Harold Miller|Frank Mills|Bert Moorhouse|Clive Morgan|Sandra Morgan|Frank Puglia|George Rosener|Robert Strange|Grady Sutton|Kathryn Wilson|Florence Wix|Allen Wood
title: Dos mujeres y un amor
